summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Housing Levy, approving the 1991-1992 Overall Housing Development Plan and the 1991-1992 Administrative and Financial plans for the Large Family Program, the Scattered Site Small Family Program, the Downtown Housing Preservation Program, the Special Needs and Single Occupancy Housing and Production Program, and the Operating and Maintenance Trust Fund; and modifying the programs authorized by Ordinance 112904 consistent therewith.
